params.totalCapacity: total capacity for each worker measured in resources/time (ie GB/hr)
params.validatorsToRemove: any inactive validators that were not found on P2P

createProposal(bytes32).notice: Creates a new proposal represented by a hash of all the essential data to update from the aggregated off-chain state.

executeProposal(uint8,bytes32,uint256,ad.notice: Execute a proposal with comprehensive validation if enough votes are received

halfStateTime().notice: Half update configuration parameters to allow double to proposal creation times
